english_example_sentence: May you die peacefully after a long and peaceful life.
russian_example_sentence: Пусть вы умрёте мирно после долгой и мирной жизни.
turkish_example_sentence: Uzun ve huzurlu bir ömürden sonra huzurla ölesiniz.
